sections.title: Verse 1
content: To God be the glory, great things He has done,
So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: And Jesus died for us all on the cross;
And rose again in victory over death and loss.

sections.title: Chorus
content: O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
To make us the children of God!
